overview: The Jieyou Pavilion was forced to close amid the controversy. More than ten years later, Cheng Dalei, who greatly admired the Jieyou Pavilion, met Hua Xiaoxi, the daughter of the owner of the museum, by accident, but was involved in a conflict of interests. in a conspiracy of rights. In the end, Cheng Dalei understood the true meaning of grief and helped the old museum owner complete his wish to rebuild the grief museum.
title: The Great Rescue Operation
